TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sarad, title = Sarad, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sarad} }

S.FORM: Sarad Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hualien ko Sarad a niyaro', 3,309 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 8,721 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 7% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 608 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 93% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 8,113 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis5%, Truku1%, Bunun0.5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

Sarad Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hoalien ko Sarad a niyaro', 3,309 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 8,721 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 7% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 608 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 93% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 8,113 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis5%, Troko1%, Bonon0.5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
